uas.lntv.pacmangame.Scenes

Class Hud

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Scenes.Hud

  • public class Hud
extends java.lang.Object
    (Jabba)The HUD shows: Score, Time, Lives and functions as a Pause-button.
